column4: Sup dildos and dildettes? With the recent shenanigans, it has been revealed that Maddox and co have been here more than normal looking for “evidence” or “dirt” or whateverthefuck they think they need. Since they’re here, and because Jaime stole my dope hit by insulting them funnier in another thread, I figured we should all write them a letter.  “Dear Madcast...”
Dear Madcast,You're all less funny than me. And I am a girl.

Dear madcast,The guy who runs your network argued, in a legal document, that human beings are property. I'll walk you through it because, if the internet has taught me anything, people on the internet have trouble understanding law. Conversion is a property claim. You can think of it as the civil analogue of theft. He claimed his fans were converted. Legally, that's saying that people like me are roperty that he owned, and that Dick stole me in the way one might steal their neighbor's bike. That only works if we get rid of the amendments that did away with humans can be property sometimes," and also if consumers of comedy aren't making their own decisions. Maybe ya'll should consider what that, combined with how he talks about his fans means about, means about what he actually thinks about you. Don't worry, I've got a sealed envelope with his real opinion inside.Love, Me"
We sincerely hope our discourse enrages and makes your blood boil to the point of throwing stuff at the screen...

Dear Madcast,Welcome to our humble subreddit with 7,000+ subscribers. You’re free to look for rape lists as long as you want but unfortunately you will not find any. Of course, I’m sure I will not be able to convince you otherwise. Help yourself to some good ‘ol reddit gold with your dumbass posts in which you tell us how we are all delusional pyschopaths, we don’t mind, and above all, go fuck yourselves.
Dear Madcast,Please stay a supreme cuck and faggot because you've provided far more laughs this way than when you actually try to be funny and entertaining.Regards,A former fan
Yes madcast.  I’m sure I’m not alone amongst the other roasters here when I say I felt left out of the lawsuit just because you only really used posts from Twitter :( Consider us next time!
